label: WorkItemDimension
comment: A measure of spatial extent associated with this work item, such as length, breadth, or height.

datatypeProperties.comment: A work item component dimension for this work item dimension.
The code specifying the contractual language for this basic work item.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
The code specifying the type of this work item dimension.

referencedBy.comment: A work item dimension of the actual quantity in this work item quantity analysis.
A work item component dimension for this work item dimension.
